short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tiny browser extension which closes Cisco Secure Client browser window notifications after 10 seconds.  Inspired by Clozoom.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clocisco is a tiny browsew extension which closes Cisco Cecure Client browser notification windows after successful VPN connection and disconnection.
